issues.description: No specific CTA copy defined - just 'position prominently' is too vague for conversion optimization
issues.rationale: CTA text drives clicks more than placement alone

issues.description: 48px H1 on mobile will cause horizontal scrolling and poor readability
issues.rationale: Mobile screens need responsive typography scaling

issues.description: Trust proof placement 'below solution' buries social validation too deep in scroll
issues.rationale: Users need trust signals above the fold

issues.description: No mobile-specific touch target sizes defined for CTA buttons
issues.rationale: 8px padding creates 32px buttons - below 44px mobile standard

issues.description: Pricing table 'side-by-side' will break on mobile - no responsive strategy defined
issues.rationale: Side-by-side tables are unusable on 375px screens

issues.description: 40px section gaps waste precious mobile viewport height
issues.rationale: Mobile needs tighter spacing to reduce scroll fatigue

issues.description: Green trust color #4BB543 fails WCAG contrast on white backgrounds
Hero stacking puts CTA 'at top' but no secondary CTA strategy for scroll
issues.rationale: Single CTA placement loses users who scroll past

issues.description: Problem/solution alignment creates rigid layout that won't adapt to content length
issues.rationale: Direct alignment breaks when content varies

issues.description: No loading state or skeleton screens defined for trust elements
issues.rationale: Testimonials loading slowly will create layout shift

suggestedFixes.fix: Use action-oriented copy: 'Start Free 14-Day Trial' with urgency indicator 'No credit card required'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific copy with risk reversal increases CTR by 30%+

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement fluid typography: clamp(32px, 5vw, 48px) for responsive scaling
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains readability across all devices without overflow

suggestedFixes.fix: Add trust bar with logos above fold, full testimonials in mid-page social proof section
Set minimum touch target 44x44px with 16px vertical padding, 24px horizontal
Use accordion pattern on mobile with most popular plan expanded by default
suggestedFixes.rationale: Accordion maintains comparison ability in limited space

suggestedFixes.fix: Use responsive spacing: 24px mobile, 40px tablet, 64px desktop
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes content density per device category

suggestedFixes.fix: Darken to #2E7D2E for 7:1 contrast ratio, use original for backgrounds only
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures WCAG AA compliance for all text uses

suggestedFixes.fix: Add sticky CTA bar that appears after 50% scroll with simplified message
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent CTA captures users at decision moments

suggestedFixes.fix: Use CSS grid with auto-flow for flexible problem/solution pairing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Grid adapts to content while maintaining visual connection

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement progressive loading with skeleton screens, prioritize above-fold content
suggestedFixes.rationale: Prevents layout shift and improves perceived performance
